title: Creature
description: Basic creature, which can be applied to NPCs or PCs.

ac.title: Armor Class
ac.description: Numeric value used to determine how difficult this creature is to hit with an attack.

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: Things that this creature can do with its action on its turn. Does not include 'special' actions like lair, legendary, or villain actions.

alignment.title: Alignment
alignment.description: Represents the creature's outlook on morality and order.

bonus_actions.title: Bonus Actions
bonus_actions.description: Actions that consume the 'bonus' action phase during a creature's turn.

condition_immunity.title: Condition Immunity
condition_immunity.description: Conditions to which this creature is immune, meaning that they cannot recieve these conditions.

cr.title: Challenge Rating
cr.description: A number that represents how much of a challenge a creature will present.

damage_immunity.title: Damage Immunity
damage_immunity.description: Damage types to which this creature is immune, meaning they will take no damage.

damage_resistance.title: Damage Reistance
damage_resistance.description: Damage types to which this resistant, meaning that it will take half damage.

damage_vulnerability.title: Damage Vulnerability
damage_vulnerability.description: Damage types to which this vulnerable, meaning that it will take double damage.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: Where this creature may be found.

hp.title: Hit Points
hp.description: Representation of the average health of a creature of this type.

hit_dice.title: Hit Dice
hit_dice.description: The formula for deriving how many hit points a creature has. Also used for other things, like healing when resting.

lair_actions.title: Lair Actions
lair_actions.description: Special actions that powerful creatures can take when in the area defined as their lair.

legendary_actions.title: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.description: Special actions that powerful creatures can take.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this creature or creature type.

proficiency_bonus.name: Proficiency Bonus
proficiency_bonus.description: A value that modifies most roles, largely based on the level or challenge of the creature.

reactions.title: Reactions
reactions.description: Actions that can consume the reaction phase of a creatures turn.

role.name: Role
role.description: The role this creature is intended to take in combat.

senses.title: Senses
senses.description: Any special senses the creature poseses.

size.title: Size
size.description: The size category into which this creature falls.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Skills that this creature has access to. Generally this defines only skills in which this creature is trained or proficient.

speed.title: speed
speed.description: How quickly a creature can move, in feet.

source.title: Source
source.description: What source material this creature is drawn from.

type.name: Type
type.description: The general type this creature is, i.e. humanoid, undead, plant, etc.

tags.description: Other arbitrary tags to expand on the type.
